inputs.selection_motivation: UK gilt yields are a key driver of the USD index (DXY) through their impact on GBP/USD and relative yield differentials, making gilt10y a primary influence on the DXY.
inputs.candidate_motivation: UK 10‑year gilt yields move in tandem with other sovereign yields, central‑bank policy, inflation expectations, and currency dynamics; therefore US, German, and Japanese yields, Fed and ECB policy, inflation data, and major FX pairs are the most likely direct or competitive influences or peers.

proposed_link.motivation: UK gilt yields are a key driver of the USD index (DXY) through their impact on GBP/USD and relative yield differentials, making gilt10y a primary influence on the DXY.
